name: GOSPELL
0:
”Alexa, open smart performer”
”Alexa, ask smart performer to turn off office camera motion detection”
”Alexa, ask smart performer to turn office camera right”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart performer
des:
Control your GOSPELL Smart Camera with your voice using skill. Pan and tilt the camera, get motion, temperature, and sound alert info and much more!
You need at least one GOSPELL Smart Camera and an skill-enabled speaker (like the GOSPELL Smart Speaker). Simply search for "GOSPELL" in the app, select the GOSPELL Smart Camera skill and press "Enable Skill."
Once your GOSPELL Smart Camera and this skill are linked, you're ready to go! 
Then control your camera by using one of the following phrases:
"Pan the {device name} camera left/right"
"Tilt the {device name} camera up/down"
"Take a picture with the {device name} camera"
"Start recording with the {device name} camera"
"Turn on/off {device name} camera motion detection" 
"Turn on/off {device name} camera temperature alert"
"Turn on/off {device name} camera sound detection"
"Play/stop lullaby on {device name} camera"
"Check the temperature at the {device name} camera"
"Check the last sound/motion detected by {device name} camera"

Version 1.0.3
